title: üõ†Ô∏è How to Configure Thrustmaster T.16000M for MSFS 2024: Step-by-Step Guide! üöÄ
description:
In this video, we provide a detailed, step-by-step guide on how to configure the Thrustmaster T.16000M for Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 (MSFS 2024). The default configuration is almost unusable, so follow along as we show you how to set up your controller for the best flight simulation experience. Whether you're a seasoned pilot or new to the flight sim community, this tutorial will help you get the most out of your Thrustmaster T.16000M. Don't miss out on optimizing your setup and enhancing your flight sim adventures!

00:00 - intro
00:25 - intro video
00:34 - review the different profiles
02:08 - Creating the profiles
03:15 - Clearing the bindings
03:41 - Configuring the joystick
17:07 - Testing the configuration
24:43 - Bonus configuration
27:16 - outro

If you are looking for steps how to configure the yoke, check this video: 
https://youtu.be/Qkdgql7xCww
